generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance, clearly designated for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible along the right edge of the road, adjacent to the parked police cars, and also along the left side of the road bordered by trees.
- building: A large, multi-story building with stone or concrete facade is prominently visible on the right side of the image.
- vegetation: Numerous trees with green and yellow leaves are visible along the left side of the road and in the background.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing overcast or cloudy.
- car: Multiple police cars (marked with blue and white stripes) are parked on the right side of the road. Additionally, a dark-colored SUV and other cars are visible further down the road.
- pole: Several vertical poles are visible along the road, including one near the left edge and others further down the road, likely for streetlights or signs.
- traffic sign: A red traffic sign with white text is visible in the distance on the right side of the road, mounted on a pole.
- person: A person can be seen walking on the sidewalk on the far left side of the image, near the trees.
